Interface PacManInterface


  • public interface PacManInterface
    Pac-Man must extend Actor and implement this interface.
    Since:
    2013-02-24

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eaten()
      Called when pac-man is eaten by a Ghost You should remove yourself from the grid (if you haven't already), and indicate that you've died
      void initializeStats(MyStats stats, java.awt.Color myColor)
      Called after class creation to initialize a Pac-Man.
      boolean isSuperPacMan()
      Tell Ghosts if this Pac-Man is currently super-powered.
      void start(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> grid, info.gridworld.grid.Location start)
      This method is called when Pac-Man should enter the Maze.
      void superPacMan(boolean start, info.gridworld.actor.Actor pacman)
      Called when this Pac-Man eats a PowerPellet Pac-Man should set their color to BLUE when pacman turns super and return to their original color when they've stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeStats

        void initializeStats(MyStats stats,
                   java.awt.Color myColor)
        Called after class creation to initialize a Pac-Man. Do not put your Actor in the grid in this method. The world will call start(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor>, info.gridworld.grid.Location) when you should do this.
        Parameters:
        stats - object to keep track and retrieve your own statistics see MyStats
        myColor - color to set yourself using Actor.setColor(Color)

      • start

        void start(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<info.gridworld.actor.Actor> grid,
         info.gridworld.grid.Location start)
        This method is called when Pac-Man should enter the Maze. Use putSelfInGrid to add yourself to the designated location.
        Parameters:
        grid - the grid to add yourself too
        start - the starting location for this ghost

      • superPacMan

        void superPacMan(boolean start,
               info.gridworld.actor.Actor pacman)
        Called when this Pac-Man eats a PowerPellet Pac-Man should set their color to BLUE when pacman turns super and return to their original color when they've stopped. A Pac-Man may eat ghosts when any other pac-man is super.
        Parameters:
        start - will be true when a pacman turns super and false when time is up.
        pacman - the Pac-Man turning super, you should check if this is you before doing things

      • eaten

        void eaten()
        Called when pac-man is eaten by a Ghost You should remove yourself from the grid (if you haven't already), and indicate that you've died

      • isSuperPacMan

        boolean isSuperPacMan()
        Tell Ghosts if this Pac-Man is currently super-powered.
        Returns:
        returns true if this pac-man is currently super, otherwise false
